verbose_text: The positioning of the GFP tag in the fusion protein did not interfere with the ability of the proteins during binding to ice and have actually enhanced the TH activity as a result of the larger protein size (36 kDa) [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] (XREF_FIG a, b).
evidence:
GFP tag in the fusion protein did
not interfere with the ability of the proteins during binding to ice and have
actually enhanced the TH
